Summary: Lights in V shape appeared at one section of the sky then fly silently across portion of sky then disappear- all silently
divs: Sighting DetailsOn or about August 2nd, 1962, I and seven members of my family observed lights in the shae of a "V" appear in a portion of the sky about 75 degrees above then cross the sky silently and make a sharp turn (randomly with each crossing) and the disappear. There were multiple V shapes which performed this way at various starting and ending points in the sky. At the highly of this display there were at least three or four shapes performing this consistently. The entire anomaly took about 10 minutes to complete. I was 10 years old at the time, the youngest person to witness the event. Several adults also witnessed this event with one still living. Other adolescents can also verify my account. After all these years I wanted to offer this first hand account for review and recording.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Stafford
There were 5 other sightings in Stafford on or around August 2nd 1962
